entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of light snow near noon and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
